en.name: Personal growth through a polarity lens
en.resources: - Johnson, B. 1992 Polarity Management: Identifying and Managing Unsolvable Problems. HRD Press, MA, USA
en.actions: - Learn more in the section about "Personal growth through a polarity lens" in the [IDG Field Kit](FIELD_KIT_LINK).
en.description:
We often experience personal growth as going from something about ourselves that we would like to change. The Polarity Map is a wisdom organizer - the wisdom in you.

Get an understanding of historic strengths while at the same time looking forward towards what you want to develop.
